name: PERFUSION_SUPPORT
description: Table for the multiple-response Perfusion Mechanical Circulatory Support (I ORG 3110) item.

columns.name: ORG_RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the organ record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PERFUSION_SUPPORT_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the mechanical circulatory support device used to aid perfusion during the transplant surgery.
